sen.j: 吉記（きっき）は、平安時代末期の公家・吉田経房（1142年 - 1200年）の日記である。
sen.e: Kikki is a diary written by Tsunefusa YOSHIDA (1142-1200), a court noble who lived in the late Heian period.

sen.j: 経房は勧修寺流藤原氏（俗に日記の家と呼ばれる）。
sen.e: Tsunefusa was from Kajuji line of the Fujiwara clan (so-called the house of diary).

sen.j: 権右中弁藤原光房の子で、京都の東郊・吉田に別邸を建てたため、「吉田権中納言」と呼ばれ、吉田家の祖となった。
sen.e: He was a son of Junior Middle Executive Officer of the Right FUJIWARA no Mitsufusa, and built his second residence at Yoshida, the eastern suburb of Kyoto, so he was called 'Yoshida Junior Middle Councillor' and became a founder of the Yohisda family.

sen.e: Tsunefusa's diary was later called "Kikki" after his last name Yoshida (the letter for "Yoshi (吉)" is also pronounced "Kitsu.").

sen.j: 仁安 (日本)元年（1166年）から建久4年（1193年）まで28年分が記録されていたというが、原本は現存せず、写本（ほとんどは子孫の甘露寺親長の蒐集した書写）や他の書に引用された佚文を合わせても、断続的に13年分が残るのみとなっている。
sen.e: The diary is said to have covered 28 years from 1166 to 1193, but the original manuscript is not extant, and the copied manuscript (most of them were collected or copied by his descendant Chikanaga KANROJI) and some lost documents which were cited in other books make only 13-year fragmentary records.

sen.j: 「日記の家」勧修寺流の他の公家の日記と同様、朝廷の儀式・典礼などに関する記事が詳しい。
sen.e: As well as the diaries written by other court nobles in the Kajuji line or 'house of diary,' it has detailed records of ceremonies and rituals in the Imperial court.

sen.e: Covering the era of the Jisho-Juei War, it is an important historical material to know the movement of the Imperial court in that time.

sen.j: 『吉記』は、内乱期の経房が蔵人頭・院別当として、朝廷の決定を詳しく知ることのできる立場にあったため、同じ内容の記事でも、まだ朝廷で中心的な立場になる前の九条兼実の『玉葉』より詳細な事実を知ることができる箇所もある。
sen.e: Because Tsunefusa held positions of Kurodo gashira (Head of the Imperial Secretary Office) and In-Betto (chief of the retired Emperor's palace) during the disturbance and knew well the decisions made by the Imperial court, "Kikki" has more detailed records than "Gyokuyo," a diary written by Kanezane KUJO, who was not a leading figure in the Imperial court yet at that time.
